thread.section_title: Prince de Galles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent value at this wonderful location
thread.title_full: Excellent value at this wonderful location - Review of Prince de Galles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 11bern
title: Excellent value at this wonderful location
text:
Last week was the first time we stayed at this hotel. Besides its excellent location, the hotel is modern, beautiful, serves a wonderful buffet. The staff is always willing to
help you. Reservations are. difficult to get, but keep trying.. Surprisingly, the hotel's rates are very fair. We will definitely return. We came to celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary. The hotel could not have been nicer.
